Question
========
What are characteristics of a data fram in R?

Answerlist
----------
* Rows usually contain observations.
* Columns usually contain variables.
* Data frames can contain variables of different data types. (e.g. numbers or strings)
* Only one variable can be stored in a data frame.
* Only data for one person can be stored in a data frame.
* Variables in a data frame can't be used in a statistical analysis.


Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* True.
* True.
* True.
* False.
* False.
* False.
